title: cd packaging foil bubble wrap
content:

comments.content: Talk to your printer. They get samples of all this stuff from manufacturers.
unfortunately I live in Fayetteville, Arkansas and there is no such thing as a printer that prints beyond vinyl banners, shirts, regular paper on foamboard, and building plans :(
